0.title: Simon dice

1.desc: Another initial project, a clicker game kinda thing that helps you make ART.

2.title: Pokedex

3.title: Blinker
3.desc: A bullet hell-like game, developed in React and Redux. Helped me to figure out a lot of things about the React lifecycle.

4.title: Sudoku
4.desc: Funny story, I once read that I should have an algorithm implementation in my Portfolio. But instead of doing that I developed my own. Not pretty, but works.

5.title: El Principito

6.title: Blinker13
6.desc: A submission for jsk13, a game jam built around developing a full game in only 13kbs, finished 83th of +200 entries.

7.title: Alkemy
7.desc: A back-end challenge for Alkemy. App + Api + Authentication + Postgres database. Documented with Postman.

8.title: Pathfinder
8.desc: Implementation of the A* pathing algorithm.

9.title: Karken
9.desc: E-commerce solution I developed for a friend. Postgres, Next, Material-UI. If the dyno is on, it's better through karken.com.ar

10.title: Reflections
10.desc: Looking for a performant reflection animation not based in CSS.
